overview: Look who screamed into town! It's Teri Weigel's return to porn, and she's not just back --she's back with an ass-pounding DV-DP vengeance! In this story, Teri's under police protection because she witnessed a mob robbery. Only problem is, she's a porn director. Solution: Bring the cops to work and thank them with a big double-pussy, double penetration! She's not just screaming-- she's creaming and screaming... 'Encore!'
title: Encore
